gov.noaa.ncdc.crn.dao
Interface ElementDao.LastModsQueryBuilder

All Known Implementing Classes:
ElementDaoImpl.LastModsQueryBuilderImpl
Enclosing interface:
ElementDao
public static interface ElementDao.LastModsQueryBuilder

Builds a query to retrieve a List of datetimes which were modified during a time period. Different combinations of parameters can be used query the database.

Usage Example

String endhour = "2010050614"; int hours = 3; LastModsQueryBuilder query = lastModsQueryBuilder(); query.buildEndhours(endhour); query.buildNumberOfHours(hours); List datelist = query.list(); Datelist may contain {"2010050612", "2010050613", "2010050614"} (if during each of these three hours some observation has a last mod time).

Author:
Andrea.Fey

Method Detail

buildStations

void buildStations(int... stationIds)
Adds a stationId(s) parameter to the LastModsQueryBuilder

Parameters:
stationIds - the ids of the stations to include

buildEndhours

void buildEndhours(java.lang.String... endhours)
Adds a required endhour(s) parameter to the LastModsQueryBuilder

Parameters:
endhours - YYYYMMDDHH24 end time(s) of the last time we're considering database modifications

buildNumberOfHours

void buildNumberOfHours(int hours)
Adds the number of hours to consider database modifications. The list() method will retrieve all UTC datetimes which were modified between (endhour-hours) and endhour. Defaults to 1.

Parameters:
hours - the number of hours to consider

buildNumberOfDays

void buildNumberOfDays(int days)
Adds the number of days to consider database modifications. The list() method will then retrieve all UTC datetimes which were modified between (endhour-days*24hrs) and endhour. Defaults to 1.

Parameters:
days - the number of days to consider

list

java.util.List<java.lang.String> list()
                                      throws java.sql.SQLException
Retrieves a List of YYYYMMDDHH24 times representing the ends of the hours the database has been modified during the hours leading up to the endhour(s) parameter

Returns:
List of YYYYMMDDHH24 modification times
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException
